org.projecthaystack

Class HWatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.projecthaystack.HWatch

  • public abstract class HWatch
extends Object
    HWatch models a subscription to a list of entity records. Use HProj.watchOpen to create a new watch.
    See Also:
    Project Haystack

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HWatch() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void close()
      Close the watch and free up any state resources.
      abstract String dis()
      Debug display string used during "HProj.watchOpen"
      abstract String id()
      Unique watch identifier within a project database.
      abstract boolean isOpen()
      Return whether this watch is currently open.
      abstract HNum lease()
      Lease period or null if watch has not been opened yet.
      abstract HGrid pollChanges()
      Poll for any changes to the subscribed records.
      abstract HGrid pollRefresh()
      Poll all the subscribed records even if there have been no changes.
      HGrid sub(HRef[] ids)
      Convenience for "sub(ids, true)"
      abstract HGrid sub(HRef[] ids, boolean checked)
      Add a list of records to the subscription list and return their current representation.
      abstract void unsub(HRef[] ids)
      Remove a list of records from watch.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HWatch

        public HWatch()

    • Method Detail

      • id

        public abstract String id()
        Unique watch identifier within a project database. The id may not be assigned until after the first call to "sub", in which case return null.

      • dis

        public abstract String dis()
        Debug display string used during "HProj.watchOpen"

      • lease

        public abstract HNum lease()
        Lease period or null if watch has not been opened yet.

      • sub

        public final HGrid sub(HRef[] ids)
        Convenience for "sub(ids, true)"

      • sub

        public abstract HGrid sub(HRef[] ids,
                          boolean checked)
        Add a list of records to the subscription list and return their current representation. If checked is true and any one of the ids cannot be resolved then raise UnknownRecException for first id not resolved. If checked is false, then each id not found has a row where every cell is null.

        The HGrid that is returned must contain metadata entries for 'watchId' and 'lease'.

      • unsub

        public abstract void unsub(HRef[] ids)
        Remove a list of records from watch. Silently ignore any invalid ids.

      • pollChanges

        public abstract HGrid pollChanges()
        Poll for any changes to the subscribed records.

      • pollRefresh

        public abstract HGrid pollRefresh()
        Poll all the subscribed records even if there have been no changes.

      • close

        public abstract void close()
        Close the watch and free up any state resources.

      • isOpen

        public abstract boolean isOpen()
        Return whether this watch is currently open.
